console.log("Owner Balance:", (await erc20.balanceOf(owner.address)).toString());
const [owner] = await ethers.getSigners();
console.log("Total Supply:", (await erc20.totalSupply()).toString());
console.log("Decimals:", await erc20.decimals());
console.log("Name:", await erc20.name())console.log("Symbol:", await erc20.symbol());
const erc20 = await ethers.getContractAt(erc20FacetABI, diamondAddress);
];
